description: A couple of beefy construction workers, dark-haired Damien Stone and tattooed Theo Ross, show up to renovate a kitchen. Muscular Damien in giving detailed instructions, but horny Theo, who is supposed to be taking notes, is getting distracted. Clearly, chiseled Theo only has one thing of his mind! Luckily, boss Damien knows just what he needs, a hard dick in his tight, disobedient hole! Renovations will have to wait because this is one hole that needs to be plugged immediately!
title: Renovate My Hole
